title: Toxicological evaluation of SVOCs in exhaust emissions from light-duty vehicles using different fuel alternatives under sub-freezing conditions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00062E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mo Yang, Päivi Aakko-Saksa, Henri Hakkarainen, Topi Rönkkö, Päivi Koponen, Xiao-Wen Zeng, Guang-Hui Dong, Pasi I. Jalava
SVOC toxicity in vehicle exhaust varies by fuel. Stricter diesel regulations haven't reduced toxicity. Gasoline exhaust poses the highest risk, with compressed natural gas and ethanol/gasoline also showing notable toxicity.
